attributes.title: ITC Grand Chola
attributes.description: Situated along Mount Road in Chennai, ITC Grand Chola is 8 km from the Chennai International Airport. It features 10 dining options and an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The best stay ever! Great place to completely spoil yourself. No need to leave the hotel. There are amazing restaurants, cafes, pools.

attributes.title: Novotel Chennai Chamiers Road
attributes.description: Novotel Chennai Chamiers Road - An Accor Brand is located in the city centre near Anna Salai. We didn't get to stay very long - we only stayed one night and we were out for most of the day. However, we were very happy with the room and the hotel's staff and service.

attributes.title: ibis Chennai City Centre
attributes.description: Located on Anna Salai Road, opposite Metro Station, ibis Chennai City Centre - An Accor Brand is 20 minutes by Metro to the Chennai Airport. The hotel features a well-equipped fitness center, ‘The Hub’ lobby level bar and ‘Spice It’ Multi-cuisine 24 hours restaurant with the longest breakfast from 4 am to noon.
